Team Babylon A collective blog for a collection of nerds.

Welcome to our blog!

08 Nov 2017
Team Babylon is a collective blog for a collection of nerds.

This blog is the collaboration of UC Irvine Computer Science graduates: Brett Settle, Alexander Thompson, John Thorpe, Nicholas Prendergast. We created Team Babylon to talk about personal projects and hobbies, and hopefully motivate future group projects.
